Subject: US v. Maxwell, 
20 Cr. 330 (MN) 
Date: Fri, 09 Oct 2020 00:00:39 +0000 
Attachments: 2020-10-08_Letter 
to_GM_counsel_re_discovery_&_MDC_conditions.pdf 
(USANYS)" 
Counsel, 
Attached please find a letter responding to your correspondence of September 21, 2020 and October 1, 2020 regarding 
the above-captioned case. 
As noted in this letter, today the MDC approved the Government's request to allow an FBI agent bring a secure laptop to 
the institution for you to review with your client, so long as no other electronic devices are brought into the room with 
the secure laptop. Please let me know what day or days you would like to schedule such a visit for next week, and I will 
coordinate with the FBI and the MDC to arrange the visit. 
Best, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
EFTA00026812
